entry.title: sh13y/Musixmatch: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.
entry.content: This project is a lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Musixmatch API, making it super easy to fetch lyrics, track info, and artist details. Perfect for music apps, Discord bots, or settling lyric-based arguments with friends.

entry.title: Saeid-Za/cleana: 🧼 Clean JavaScript Objects and Arrays, recursively. Lightweight and Fast.

entry.title: iosif-gogolos/phishing-shepard: Phishing Shepard is a lightweight, static website designed to help users detect potential phishing attempts by analyzing copied messages for embedded URLs. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, this tool extracts URLs from user input, retrieves metadata from the identified links, and provides feedback on their authenticity.
entry.content: Phishing Shepard is a lightweight, static website designed to help users detect potential phishing attempts by analyzing copied messages for embedded URLs. Built with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, this tool extracts URLs from user input, retrieves metadata from the identified links, and provides feedback on their authenticity.

entry.content: A fast, lightweight WhatsApp bot powered Baileys Web API

entry.title: Radiaidel/TuneFlow: TuneFlow is a lightweight music app built with Angular and NgRx. Manage your local tracks with CRUD operations, enjoy seamless playback with an interactive audio player, and organize songs by categories. Designed for a smooth user experience and scalable architecture.
entry.content: TuneFlow is a lightweight music app built with Angular and NgRx. Manage your local tracks with CRUD operations, enjoy seamless playback with an interactive audio player, and organize songs by categories. Designed for a smooth user experience and scalable architecture.

entry.title: asmaelabid/date-formatter-i18n: A lightweight and developer-friendly **date formatting library** with full **i18n (internationalization)** support. Easily format dates into human-readable strings, customize relative time ("3 days ago"), and create localized messages. Perfect for multilingual web and mobile applications.
entry.content: A lightweight and developer-friendly **date formatting library** with full **i18n (internationalization)** support. Easily format dates into human-readable strings, customize relative time ("3 days ago"), and create localized messages. Perfect for multilingual web and mobile applications.

entry.title: qodalis-solutions/angular-web-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
